title: Power - energy dissipated when I equals alpha t

content.description: The current in a resistor of resistance <math alttext="R sub 0" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub></math> varies with time <math alttext="t" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math>. Starting at <math alttext="t equals 0" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>, the current in the resistor is <math alttext="I of t equals alpha t" overflow="scroll"> <mi>I</mi> <mrow> <mo>(</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>)</mo> </mrow> <mo>=</mo> <mi>α</mi> <mi>t</mi> </math>, where <math alttext="alpha" overflow="scroll"><mi>α</mi></math> is a positive constant.
content.question: How much energy is dissipated by the resistor during the time interval <math alttext="0 less than or equal to t, less than or equal to t sub f" overflow="scroll"> <mstyle displaystyle="true"> <mn>0</mn> <mo>≤</mo> <mi>t</mi> <mo>≤</mo> <msub> <mi>t</mi> <mi>f</mi> </msub> </mstyle> </math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="alpha times R sub 0, end sub, times t sub f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mi>α</mi><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="alpha squared, times R sub 0, end sub, times t sub f, end sub, squared" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>2</mn></msubsup></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 alpha squared times R sub 0, end sub, times t sub f" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mn>2</mn><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msub><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi></msub></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="one third alpha squared times R sub 0, end sub, times t sub f, end sub, cubed" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msubsup></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="one third alpha squared times R sub 0, end sub, times t sub f, end sub, cubed" overflow="scroll"><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac><msup><mi>α</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msub><mi>R</mi><mn>0</mn></msub><msubsup><mi>t</mi><mi>f</mi><mn>3</mn></msubsup></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
